flavorText:
"Kindly steer your fleet clear of the waters west of Scrub Isle. It would be a shame to incinerate such exquisite maritime craftsmanship."
—Commodore Axurik, to Admiral Yelise

foreignData.flavorText:
„Bitte meide mit deiner Flotte die Gewässer westlich der Dorneninsel. Es wäre eine Schande, solch exquisite maritime Handwerkskunst einzuäschern."
—Kommodore Axurik zu Admiralin Yelise
foreignData.name: Karmesinflotten-Kommodore
foreignData.text:
Verursacht Trampelschaden
Wenn der Karmesinflotten-Kommodore ins Spiel kommt, wirst du zum Monarchen.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Haga el favor de mantener su flota lejos de las aguas al oeste de la isla de Scrub. Sería una pena incinerar una obra de artesanía marítima tan exquisita".
—El comodoro Axurik, a la almirante Yelise
foreignData.name: Comodoro de la Flota Carmesí
foreignData.text:
Arrolla.
Cuando el Comodoro de la Flota Carmesí entre al campo de batalla, te conviertes en el monarca.

foreignData.flavorText:
« Veuillez calmement diriger votre flotte hors des eaux à l'est de l'île de Brousse. Il serait dommage d'incendier d'aussi magnifiques vaisseaux. »
—Commodore Axurik, à l'amirale Yélise
foreignData.name: Commodore de la Flotte pourpre
foreignData.text:
Piétinement
Quand le Commodore de la Flotte pourpre arrive sur le champ de bataille, vous devenez le monarque.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Ti spiacerebbe tenere la tua flotta alla larga dalle acque a ovest dell'Isola delle Sterpaglie? Sarebbe un peccato dover ridurre in cenere esemplari marittimi di una tale squisita fattura."
—Commodoro Axurik all'Ammiraglia Yelise
foreignData.name: Commodoro della Flotta Cremisi
foreignData.text:
Travolgere
Quando il Commodoro della Flotta Cremisi entra nel campo di battaglia, diventi il monarca.

foreignData.flavorText:
「そっちの艦隊を、スクラブ島西海域に近づけないで欲しいんだがね。繊細で芸術的な船を焼いて灰にしちまうのは気が引けるからな。」
――アスリク准将からイェリゼ提督へ
foreignData.name: 真紅艦隊の准将
foreignData.text:
トランプル
真紅艦隊の准将が戦場に出たとき、あなたが統治者になる。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — オーガ・海賊

foreignData.flavorText:
"Passe longe das águas ao leste da Ilha da Moita com a sua frota, por favor. Seria uma pena incinerar essa engenharia naval tão refinada."
— Comodoro Axurik, a Almirante Yelise
foreignData.name: Comodoro da Frota Carmesim
foreignData.text:
Atropelar
Quando Comodoro da Frota Carmesim entra no campo de batalha, você se torna o monarca.

foreignData.flavorText:
「恳请贵舰速离斯鲁巴岛以西水域。此等精致画舫倘若付之一炬，甚为至憾。」
～亚胥雷准将讯告耶莉兹总帅
foreignData.name: 绯红舰队准将
foreignData.text:
践踏
当绯红舰队准将进战场时，你成为君主。

foreignData.flavorText:
「懇請貴艦速離斯魯巴島以西水域。此等精緻畫舫倘若付之一炬，甚為至憾。」
～亞胥雷准將訊告耶莉茲總帥
foreignData.name: 緋紅艦隊准將
foreignData.text:
踐踏
當緋紅艦隊准將進戰場時，你成為君主。

name: Crimson Fleet Commodore
originalText:
Trample
When Crimson Fleet Commodore enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.

rulings.text: The game starts with no monarch. Once an effect makes one player the monarch, the game will have exactly one monarch from that point forward. As a player becomes the monarch, the current monarch (if any) ceases being the monarch.

There are two inherent triggered abilities associated with being the monarch. These triggered abilities have no source and are controlled by the player who was the monarch at the time the abilities triggered. The full texts of these abilities are “At the beginning of the monarch’s end step, that player draws a card” and “Whenever a creature deals combat damage to the monarch, its controller becomes the monarch.”
If the triggered ability that causes the monarch to draw a card goes on the stack and a different player becomes the monarch before that ability resolves, the first player will still draw the card.
If the monarch leaves the game during another player’s turn, that player becomes the monarch. If the monarch leaves the game during their turn, the next player in turn order becomes the monarch.

If combat damage dealt to the monarch causes that player to lose the game, the triggered ability that causes the controller of the attacking creature to become the monarch doesn’t resolve. In most cases, the controller of the attacking creature will still become the monarch as it is likely their turn.

text:
Trample
When Crimson Fleet Commodore enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
